I am no foreigner to toxic games (See League of Legends) and let me tell you in my 60ish hours of pretty much 90% killer gameplay and 10% queues this game is not nearly as toxic as it's hyped up to be. Yea here and there sure but in general I've seen maybe 10 post game messages of varying quality. I'm sure this has to do with my modest number of hours and starting with new survivors, and if things change I will update this review, but at this moment it's a pretty damn good time with sometimes annoying survivors but not toxic.
Very interesting game, but before you buy check out some videos and  gameplay because its not for everyone.

Skill Based Match Making has turned this entire game into one massive sweat fest. The only thing Killers and Survivors bring are the sweatest perks, items, addons, and offerings possible to ensure they win the game no matter what. There is zero fun in this game anymore.

Until SBMM is removed entirely, DbD is a boring game.

Cheaters are also running rampant like crazy, don't plan to have any fun as killer as 99% of the cheaters are only playing Survivor.

Update: 6/14/2022 it's almost time for the 6th Anniversary and I've had to report three people for cheating in the last 12 hours, what the actual fuck. Review stays negative, matchmaking is still pretty bad but the cheaters are way too abundant.

I may not have many hours on this game but I disagree with a lot of the reviews. Sometimes yes the killer can seem overpowered but for me i always find if you have a decent team who have basic knowledge of how to repair generators you can win it. Yes some killers have ridiculous abilities but it's never impossible to beat a killer no matter how many hours you or they have played for. I personally have not received any back handed comments from any other players so far and have never insulted another player either. I always enjoy playing it with other people it just makes it a bit easier when there is some sort of communication going on. In conclusion i have to say i think this game is great and will remain great. 60 hours played and i plan to play for a lot more. If someone new reads this and wants to play with someone not judging them let me know.
